data.title: BLL Feb 1 2018
data.meta_description: BLL_Feb_1_2018 - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or view presentation slides online. This document provides a list of books recommended by the Mathematical Association of America (MAA) Basic Library List (BLL). It includes over 50 titles covering various mathematics topics such as algebra, analysis, geometry, number theory, and more. Each entry includes the book title, author, edition, publisher, publication year, and BLL rating. The BLL rating ranges from one to three stars based on the book's importance and relevance to undergraduate mathematics education.
